name: Shen Tuan
story: Yan Tou grew up in a small village in the southern region of China. His family was poor, but Yan was determined to make a better life for himself. He joined the military as soon as he was old enough, and quickly rose through the ranks thanks to his impressive scouting skills. Yan is known for his quiet, thoughtful demeanor and his ability to stay calm under pressure. He is a loyal soldier and a devoted husband to his wife, who lives in the village where he grew up.
